## Job.remove() method

Completely remove the job from the queue. Note, this call will throw an exception if the job is being processed when the call is performed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
